author: Natalie

review: Works good for the most part, setup is pretty easy, with one downfall.  You must have wifi in order to install the chromecast app.  This was not a problem on my phone, but my desktop is wired only, so I was not able to use it with my desktop.  My understanding is once it is installed, it will work fine with a wired connection on the pc, but it won't let you complete installation unless you have wifi.  Other than that, it works fine with my phone.  I'm rather disappointed in the app selection, but the device itself seems fine.  I'd really like to see an option to stream local network media.  Seems like an app like that should have been included.  You can do it with Plex, and I have no problem paying for the $5 app, but a $5 monthly fee on top of that just to have the option of chromecast seems like robbery.  I'm hopeful the app selection will improve soon.
